TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TypedTableBaseExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains the extension methods for the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The class contains static extension methods that define the <xref:System.Data.TypedTableBaseExtensions.AsEnumerable%2A> method and standard query operations for typed data sets.
This class cannot be instantiated.

Docs.typeparam: The type to convert the elements of the source to.
Docs.summary: Enumerates the data row elements of the and returns an object, where the generic parameter is . This object can be used in a [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] expression or method query.
Docs.returns: An object, where the generic parameter is .

Docs.typeparam: The type of the elements or the row.
Docs.param: An enumerable object to return an element from.
The zero-based index of the element to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Returns the element at a specified row in a sequence or a default value if the row is out of range.
Docs.returns: The element at a specified row in a sequence.

Docs.typeparam: The type of the row elements in source, .
Docs.param: A that contains the elements to invoke a transformation function upon.
A transformation function to apply to each element.
Docs.summary: Projects each element of a into a new form.
Docs.returns: An whose elements are the result of invoking the transformation function on each element of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This projection method requires the transformation function, `selector`, to produce one value for each value in the source sequence, `source`. If `selector` returns a value that is itself a collection, the consumer must traverse the sub-sequences manually.
